title: Machine Learning Workshop
description: Join us for an comprehensive workshop on machine learning fundamentals and applications. Learn about neural networks, data preprocessing, and model evaluation techniques. This hands-on session will cover practical implementation using Python and popular ML libraries. Participants will work on real-world datasets and build their first ML models.

title: 5G Technology Seminar
description: Explore the revolutionary world of 5G wireless communication technology. Industry experts will discuss the technical aspects of 5G networks, their implementation challenges, and future applications. Topics include beamforming, massive MIMO, network slicing, and IoT integration. Perfect for students interested in telecommunications and wireless systems.

title: Women in Engineering Panel
description: An inspiring panel discussion featuring successful women engineers from various industries. Panelists will share their career journeys, challenges they've overcome, and advice for aspiring female engineers. Topics include work-life balance, leadership opportunities, and breaking barriers in STEM fields. Networking session follows the panel.

title: Community Service Project
description: Join IEEE SIGHT for a meaningful community service project focused on digital literacy education. We'll be teaching basic computer skills to underprivileged children in local community centers. Volunteers will help set up equipment, assist with teaching, and mentor young learners. This is a great opportunity to give back to the community while developing leadership skills.

title: IoT Innovation Challenge
description: A competitive hackathon focused on Internet of Things solutions for smart cities. Teams will have 24 hours to develop innovative IoT prototypes addressing urban challenges like traffic management, energy efficiency, or environmental monitoring. Industry mentors will guide participants, and winning teams receive cash prizes and internship opportunities.

title: Robotics Competition
description: Annual robotics competition where teams design and build autonomous robots to complete specific tasks. This year's challenge involves navigation through obstacle courses and object manipulation. Participants will demonstrate their engineering skills in mechanical design, programming, and problem-solving. Prizes awarded for innovation, technical excellence, and teamwork.
